boardgame.name: Absurd and Surreal Encounters for Fantasy Games
boardgame.description:
A collection of 100 surreal encounters for fantasy games.
An entry for RPGGeek 2021 24-hour supplement contest.

boardgame.name: High Noon Showdown
boardgame.description:
Tension fills the air... It is high noon and all the town folk have prepared themselves to face off in the center of town. Who will be faster? Who will win? It is time for the High Noon Showdown!

In High Noon Showdown, you will be acting, and reacting, in a rapid race to build up an attack (or to defend yourself) over multiple rounds. You and every other player are gunning for each other to reduce your enemies’ Life Points to 0, eliminating them from the game. Don't forget about your unique character abilities to turn the odds of winning in your favor as you try to outdraw your opponents. Will you be the last one standing and declare victory, or will you fall to the lawlessness of the west? The choice is yours. Now DRAW!!!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Fortress of the Stone Giants
boardgame.description: An adventure for 5th edition D&D, intended for characters 14th level or higher.

boardgame.name: Siege Survival: Gloria Victis
boardgame.description:
Siege Survival: Gloria Victis is a resource management survival game, set in the middle ages, where you lead a group of civilians to try and survive the brutal siege of your city.

SCAVENGING

Venturing out from the safety of your keep, you have to explore the ransacked city at night to collect raw materials, abandoned goods and weapons that you need to survive and hold out long enough for the reinforcements to drive away the attackers.

CRAFTING

You need better weapons, a roof over your head, hot food and all the other trappings that just existing entail; and the only way you’ll get these is if you and your team craft them. But resources are scarce and you’ll need to manage them wisely to make it through in one piece.

SURVIVING

Defending what’s left of your city are a few tired troops in dire need of arrows, weapons and armour. You need to keep this squad supplied and supported in every way possible ahead of their battles every few days. Not only that, but you have to avoid the enemy soldiers when you go out into no man’s land every night.

Source: The Publisher Website.

boardgame.name: Gloria Victis
boardgame.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE




This game is still in active development and available to the public for purchase in it's unfinished state, either in Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between).





Gloria Victis is a MMORPG with an emphasis on realism, set in a medieval world with low-fantasy elements. It offers Open PVP with territory control, non-target combat, deep, expanded crafting system, player-driven economy, highly reduced magic and mature, extensive storyline – all that served with beautiful, realistic graphics and heavy, dark atmosphere.Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: Cult of the Great Mother
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Mystery cults are secret societies that exist within religious institutions. Like other secret societies, their existence is well known, but their rituals, lore, and objectives are concealed. Only the initiated are allowed access to these secrets.

This file provides an overview of mystery cults and specific details about the Cult of the Great Mother, the most important and influential deity in this setting.

Features:

Sample cult secrets
The location of the Great Mother's major temples
Festivals held in the Great Mother's honor
Campaign lore explaining how Amazons and Valkyries are related
DIY Genital Mutilation (with saving throws)
Assassination
A pantheon of secret, prehistoric deities
5 New Artifacts
2 New Monsters (telchines and dactyls)
Paladins riding bronze-golem steeds that have breath weapons
Earth Domain
Oath of Earth and Stone
14 new spells including Terra Form and Falling Stars
Giant Kin PC race (with 3 subspecies: Fire, Frost, and Earth)
If you are playing an Amazons Vs Valkyries campaign, this cult is essential. If you are playing another fantasy campaign with an Earth goddess, you should still check this out! And if your fantasy campaign setting doesn't have a powerful Earth Mother deity and paladins on bronze-golem steeds, it should!

boardgame.name: Foelio for Cepheus Sorcery and Barbaric!
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Foelio brings you 29 creepy foes for your game. In this supplement, we present creatures like the Byakhee, Deep Ones, Oculurks, Umbrals, and Upir for your players to face off against.

This is a supplement for the Quantum Engine, Cepheus Quantum, Cepheus Sorcery, & Barbaric!

boardgame.name: Dungeon Master's Little Black Book
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The DM's Little Black Book is a pocket-sized collection of tables and ideas that can be used in any fantasy RPG. The content is on the whole system neutral, with leanings towards Old School B/X and First Edition games in a few tables. This PDF edition includes bonus tables not included in the print edition, along with blank table templates for creating your own content.

boardgame.name: Glory: 2nd Edition
boardgame.description:
90 minute, RPG-style board game.

Roll and move adventure. Pick up quests, buy goods. Friendly competition with other players - everyone's a good guy out to help towns and defeat monsters.

Win condition is 20 points of glory- by questing, winning battles, and fate. General play is constituted by how you spend your time, estimating whether you can take on battles, and taking appropriate risks depending on the situation of other players.

50% new contend is added in 2nd edition instead of making an expansion.

boardgame.name: Explorers of Nurath
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Explorers of Nurath is a light storytelling game that nods to classic old school dungeon crawl, but introducing a simple ruleset designed for a fast and simple gameplay, good for group and solo play without a gm. This is the second edition of the game, complete with new and improved elements:


an entire section of ideas and starting point about Nurath, the world you can use for your adventures, complete with map and dedicated tables.
Improved rules, lighter, faster and more focused on story.
An improved oracle system, usable to help or completely substitute the role of a game master.
A new set of rules to manage enigmas, dangers and prebuilt scenarios.
New generic tables ready for use.

boardgame.name: Demethrius Lost Legion
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

"In an ancient and now forgotten time was a great leader who led the people of the Moors against the threat of the first Northern Serpents. But dragons weren't just formidable fighters, what really made them dangerous was the ability to tempt a man's heart and mind. Centuries have passed since those events, and like men, the dragons too have withdrawn from the Moors, now a land of death and silence whose secrets have remained hidden from the eyes, yet ready to be brought to light again."

The Lost Legion of Demetrius is a rich yet compact module for Explorers of Nurath that contains everything you need for a new adventure in the Moors.

boardgame.name: Tunnels & Trolls Beginner's Bundle
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Not sure where to start with Tunnels & Trolls? This special Beginner’s Bundle includes an introduction to the world’s 2nd oldest RPG, including a T&T Basics article, the T&T Mini-Rules, pre-rolled characters, special charts to help players and Game Masters while playing.

There is also a special section on how to create your own GM adventures with a pre-made map and tips and tools to help you learn how to be a good game master so you can run your own adventures,

We are also including a new T&T solo, Journey to Buffalo Island, and a GM adventure Tomb of Kharis. Plus a map of Trollworld, and the continent of Maneland where you can set your own adventures and a few other helpful extras.

So get your 6-sided dice, take a visit to Trollworld, and prepare to learn how to play Tunnels & Trolls; one of the easiest to learn and most flexible role-playing games ever! For solo or group play.

boardgame.name: Freelance Traveller (Issue 105 - May/Jun 2021)
boardgame.description:
From the contents page:

Freelance Traveller #105: May/June 2021

Freelance Traveller is published bimonthly in PDF form by the editor. The current issue (and all back issues) can be found on Freelance Traveller’s website, http://www.freelancetraveller.com.
boardgame.rpgissuearticle: Doing It My Way: Factions as Characters
Doing It My Way: Native Foreigners: An Expanded Career for Barbarians
In A Store Near You: Alka Shiriigi Personal Attendant Robot
Multimedia Gallery: Twilight Stories #1: Port of Transit
Raconteurs' Rest: Virtual Traveller 2020: An After Action Report
The Shipyard: Naval Doctrine and Tech Level
The Shipyard: The Caladbolg System Defense Fleet

boardgame.name: The Mecha Hack: Mission Manual
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Mecha Hack: Mission Manual is the jam-packed follow-up to our Platinum-bestselling rules-lite mecha roleplaying game, The Mecha Hack. In addition to new rules, enemies, and player options, this 100+ page supplement includes more than 40 one-page missions, comprising everything from training missions, action-packed skirmishes, high-octane chases, perilous salvage, and everything in between.

boardgame.name: The Enemy Within Collector's Edition - Volume 2: Death on the Reik
boardgame.description:
User summary:

Slipcased collector’s editions of Death on the Reik (2nd edition) and the Death on the Reik Companion with exclusive variant covers.

boardgame.name: A.D.E.L.E.
boardgame.description:
A mission to Mars starts to go wrong when the on-board computer becomes self-aware and identifies the crew as potential threats...

ADELE is a claustrophobic and stressful one-versus-many board game for up to 5 players.
All but one player take on the role of crew members. Each one will choose a character board where a special ability, initial object and stats (spirit and life points) are indicated.
The remaining player will control the powerful and vigilant AI of the spaceship: ADELE.

On each turn, all crew members have 4 action cubes each, to secretly distribute them among the available actions, using a screen to hide their boards from ADELE.

The ADELE player has to guess what actions each crew member plans and try to hinder them as best as possible. Managing a control panel (with its own deck of cards and pool of tokens) with a limited amount of energy per turn, ADELE will create incidents on the ship: originate fires, close floodgates, remove oxygen, shut down computers… there are many options!
Will the crew be able to carry out a plan to survive?

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Organizations: Board Games Association of Creators in Spain (LUDO)

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: printed newest english and german rules. played 3 times.
Paypal Friends (Worldwide) or Money Transfer (EU only)

Spieleranzahl: 1 bis 5 Spieldauer: 60 Minuten Altersempfehlung: 12+
A.D.E.L.E. - Deutsche Version Die Zeit läuft und unser Schiff entfernt sich immer weiter von der Erde... immer weiter von unserer Rettung. ADELE ist so gnadenlos, wie es nur ein Computer sein kann, während sie uns zu entsorgen sucht, als würde jemand ein paar Insekten aus seinem Haus fegen. Was als aufregende Mission zum Mars begann, ist zu einem Albtraum geworden. Ein beklemmender, stiller Albtraum. Ich sollte in den Kommandoraum gehen, um ADELE zu deaktivieren, aber zuerst muss ich die Zugangskarte finden, damit ich hineinkomme... Verdammt! Ist die Luft in diesem Teil des Schiffes dünner..? Ich kann nicht atmen ... ich kann nicht .. atmen ...
ADELE ist ein packendes Eine-gegen -Viele-Spiel als Weltraum-Horror.
ADELE ist die zentrale KI des Raumschiffs Deimos und als sie revoltiert, wird es für die Besatzung hässlich. Tritt der Besatzung bei und erfülle die Missionen rechtzeitig, um die Leben der Besatzungsmitglieder zu retten, oder spiele als KI und werde diese nervigen Menschen los, bevor diese ihre Pläne verwirklichen. Bluffen und Vorhersehen sind in diesem Spiel von fundamentaler Bedeutung. Die Besatzung plant ihre Aktionen und versucht zu erahnen, was ADELE tun wird, während die revoltierende KI herausfinden muss, wohin die Menschen gehen und was sie im Schilde führen, um die Besatzung effektiv aufzuhalten. Werden die Menschen ihre Mission rechtzeitig durchführen oder enden sie schwebend in der ewigen Kälte, in der dich niemand schreien hört...
Inhalt: 1 Spielbrett 1 ADELE Konsole 4 Besatzungs-Tableau 4 Sichtschirme 27 ADELE Karten 25 Notfallkarten 28 Aktionssteine 4 Astronautenfiguren 1 Energiezähler 1 W20 und 4 W6 Würfel 1 Hindernisbeutel und vieles mehr...
Mit Spielregeln in folgenden Sprachen: DE

boardgame.name: I Racconti dell'Incubo
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Raccolta di tre avventure per Il Richiamo di Cthulhu, ambientate nel 1920, che metteranno gli Investigatori a confronto con l'agghiacciante universo dei Miti creato da H.P. Lovecraft.

boardgame.name: I Racconti del Terrore
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Raccolta di tre avventure per Il Richiamo di Cthulhu, ambientate nel 1920. Un mostro marino in Scozia, strani lupi nelle campagne italiane ed un complotto internazionale.

boardgame.name: Tre Volti della Paura
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Raccolta di avventure per Il Richiamo di Cthulhu ambientate in tre differenti epoche (1890, 1920 e 1990) e realizzate da Morris Stonehome.

boardgame.name: Golem
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Avventura ambientata nella Londra Vittoriana, che metterà gli Investigatori di fronte a un pericolo ben più grave e inquietante di ciò che sembra a prima vista.

boardgame.name: Canvas: Deluxe Edition
boardgame.description:
In Canvas, you play as a painter competing in an art competition. Players will collect art cards, layering 3 of them together to create their own unique Painting. Each card contains a piece of artwork as well as a set of icons used during scoring. Icons will be revealed or hidden based on the way players choose to layer the cards making for an exciting puzzle.
Paintings are scored based on a set of Scoring cards which will change each game. Once players have created and scored 3 paintings the game ends.

The player with the most points wins!

The Deluxe Edition includes:

+ 20 Wood Inspiration Tokens

+ 100 Wood Ribbon Tokens

+ 8 Award Cards (same cards as in the Mini-expansion edition)

—user summary

listing.notes:
Brand new and still in shrink.
Canvas Deluxe and Canvas Reflections Deluxe.
Payment via PayPal only please.
Price includes UK postage and fees.
International buyers please contact me for a price.

This is the first printing of Kickstarter Deluxe with premium wooden components (no expansions). Shrink removed but game unplayed. Cards still brand new with protective foil.
Base game: + Cloth Playmat + 120 Punchboard Tokens (unpunched) + 60 Transparent Cards + 20 Background Cards (sleeved) + 12 Scoring Cards (sleeved) + Rulebook
Deluxe components: + 100 Screen-printed Wood Ribbons (Deluxe) + 20 Screen-printed Wood Inspiration Tokens (Deluxe) + 5 Wood Easels with folding kickstand (Deluxe)

boardgame.name: Canvas: Reflections – Deluxe Edition
boardgame.description:
Paint from a new perspective! In Canvas: Reflections, the artistic puzzle has a new layer -- Mirror Cards! These reversible cards add deeper strategy, and also give you increased flexibility to string together combinations of Elements. Additionally, the new board offers a wider selection of Art Cards that allows you to better plan ahead and presents more choices even when running low on Inspiration Tokens.

Also features:
Gold Bonus Ribbons - Grab a Gold Bonus Ribbon for lining up a specific Element next to a Gold Bonus icon.

New Scoring Cards for puzzling new challenges and added replayability.

The Deluxe Edition includes:

+ 10 More Reversible Transparent Cards

+ 5 Signature Style Cards

+ 2 Ribbon Pins

+ 26 Expansion Wood Tokens

This edition will not be available in retail. It will only be sold through Kickstarter!

listing.notes:
Full Canvas KS experience. Canvas Deluxe Kickstarter English Edition Boardgame + Canvas Reflections Deluxe Kickstarter English Edition
New in shrink
[b]Seller info My feedback[/b] - https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/user/unq_flipmo/feedback SALE LIST - check my complete list of games and promos for sale: https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/user/unq_flipmo ; but you can ask me about ~any game really, I probably have it

boardgame.name: Dream At High Noon
boardgame.description:
We all know the scene, a group of Cowpokes gathered around a poker table, putting more than just money on the line. Their hopes, futures, burdens, and even their lives are often in the pot. A mix of fate and skill will determine what their next chapter will be… if they even have one. But honestly? Despite the risks, at least they can say they tried; that they put it all on the line for a dream of a better life. And now, dear reader, it’s our turn to do the same.

Dream At High Noon is a poker based Tabletop Role-playing Game, focused on telling stories in the cowpoke fiction genre. It uses the mechanics and feelings of playing a game of poker to create an atmosphere reminiscent of the genre, empowering everyone at the table to take part in telling a story as a group that fits within the tropes and genre of cowpoke fiction.

So, will you play your cards right, even when fate deals you a bad hand, or will they come tumbling down around you? Will High Noon see your dream come true, or will this be your final dawn?

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: ECU: Eldritch Care Unit
boardgame.description:
Hidden beneath the surface there’s another layer to the world. Supernatural creatures roam the shadows, living among and integrating into society as humankind expands into every corner they used to have to themselves. It was only a matter of time, then, before they found their way into our hospitals.

Looking for help.

The Eldritch Care Unit is a medical program that runs alongside the mundane hospitals and medical centers throughout the country. You play those doctors, nurses, occultists, and other staff members that seek to do whatever they can to cure the supernaturally sick population, despite the difficulties of incomprehensive insurance, short-staffing, and lack of funding.

It’s not easy to do this job. But you swore an Oath.

And it’s magically binding.



The Game

Eldritch Care Unit is a unique RPG taking place in the hidden supernatural wing that's present in hospitals across the United States, wherein players take on the roles of overworked doctors, nurses, ritualists, researchers, and other staff members, doing their absolute best to provide the care they can to the patients that come in. Said patients are inherently supernatural by nature or affliction, and so these rare specialists are the only ones who have a hope of fixing them up.

This book contains:


Information on the Eldritch World that these ECUs exist within.
A unique new resolution mechanic, the Adversarial System, which relies on withstanding external hardships more than testing your own capability directly.
Example patients and advice to get you started.
A fillable character sheet.


ECU is also Far Horizons Co-op Approved, guaranteeing that it was produced in fair conditions by forward-thinking people!

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: 黄色の天球 (Kiiro no Tenkyu)
boardgame.description:
黄色の天球 (Kiiro no Tenkyu) is a memo deduction game from Japan. A series of murders take place in a mountain villa. The players try to resolve who is the murderer by working out who was with the victims. It is possible that one of the players is the killer or an non-player character (NPC).

The villa is represented in the game by an eight-sided cube. Each side has a transparent window and internal walls with doorways. The player pieces are put inside the cube and during the game it is turned about. The pieces move around, some to one room, some to another.

As players are moved around, they can collect evidence cards from a corresponding plan of the villa. Each player has alibi cards face down in front of them that they can look at. By meeting up in different rooms, a player can see cards held by other players or NPCs.

A murder takes place at 9pm, and each turn is ten minutes in the game. On the hour, another murder, then a third until the game ends at midnight.

The players must try to deduce who is committing the murders and with what weapon, where and when. As the game progresses, players can make their claim by passing and becoming the start player. They score points if they identify correctly the hidden info for each crime.

Finding the murder weapon in the room is very hard but possible too.

At the end of the game, the player with the most points is the winner.
user summary
boardgame.boardgamepublisher: るりるりゲームズ (ruri ruri games)

boardgame.name: Llama Farmer
boardgame.description:
Light-strategy tabletop card game. Each player takes the role of a mountain Llama Farmer trying to make the most money ('Bucks') selling llama-wool rugs.

Players start with their own small herd of randomised primary coloured llama cards. Each turn players expand, shear, weave or sell.
Expanding adds new primary coloured llamas, or expands the llama 'family-tree' making more complex colours and patterns available.
Shearing produces wool, either unpredictably with a repeatable 'light shear' based on selected dice and numbers on the llama cards producing wool for any farmer or a one-shot 'close shave' which guarantees wool at the cost of a chilly looking llama!
Weaving combines wools into new colours or rugs and selling trades rugs for bucks in the markets. High-fashion markets want specific rugs and pay well, but a general market will buy any rug cheaply.

The game ends when all the high-fashion markets close, and the farmer with the most bucks wins.

Strategy choice comes from choosing the right rugs and llamas to go for, balancing expanding and shearing and knowing when to apply a close shave.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Terrore dal Profondo
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Questa difficile avventura è adatta per un gruppo di Investigatori esperti. È ambientata sulla costa del Maine e inizia con un’indagine sulla scomparsa di due persone.

boardgame.name: L'Isola del Fuoco
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Questa avventura porta gli intrepidi Investigatori fino a una piccola isola al largo della costa del Maine. Ci sono molte minacce, che rendono l’avventura pericolosa se i personaggi non sono cauti.

boardgame.name: L'Area di Servizio
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Gli Investigatori sono chiamati in soccorso da un amico, il cui figlio e la nuora sono scomparsi durante un viaggio a est di Los Angeles. Durante la ricerca della coppia scomparsa i personaggi si imbatteranno in un antico orrore.

boardgame.name: La Prova dell'Acqua
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Una breve e semplice avventura introduttiva per Il Richiamo di Cthulhu che si svolge negli anni ’20 e ambientata nei dintorni di Arkham, sono particolarmente appropriati sia per le leggende di stregoneria che li caratterizzano che per la presenza della Miskatonic University.

boardgame.name: Ellipses RPG Manual
boardgame.description:
Ellipses RPG makes tabletop role-playing more accessible than ever by focusing on chaotic, collaborative storytelling - not number crunching.

Features:


Streamlined, Adaptable, Accessible Ruleset



The mechanics of Ellipses RPG fit within only 3 pages of text, and are designed to work with any setting you can imagine. Role-playing newcomers can create a character within 15 minutes! Additionally, if you find yourself wanting more or less complexity, the Ellipses ruleset has built-in points of adaptability so you can create your ideal role-playing environment.



Innovative Event and Effect System



Ellipses RPG's innovative Event and Effect (or Log) system allows you to continue building your character long after their original creation. The experiences of your character, and the decisions you make, have a continuing effect on your journey through a campaign. Again, this isn't a system focused on numbers, stats, and complex abilities. It's about you, and the stories you create with others.



Session Starters Manual with Scenario Ideas!



If you choose to donate and support this system - first of all, thank you. Along with my undying gratitude, you'll receive the Session Starters manual. This guide won't provide complete, pre-built worlds for you to explore. Instead, it contains over 30 separate scenario ideas to spur your own, customized adventures.


From a Victor Frankenstein/Dracula team-up to a quest to gain the trust of a sentient castle, I hope these strange universes help spark your imagination, and get a full-blown role-playing session started that much faster!

boardgame.name: Ellipses RPG Session Starters
boardgame.description:
The Session Starters manual won't provide complete, pre-built worlds for you to explore. Instead, it contains over 30 separate scenario ideas to spur your own, customized adventures.

From a Victor Frankenstein/Dracula team-up to a quest to gain the trust of a sentient castle, I hope these strange universes help spark your imagination, and get a full-blown role-playing session started that much faster!

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: Mickey Mouse's Pizza Party Game
boardgame.description:
Players must travel along the board collecting pizzas. The first one to get to the end of the board with 3 pizzas wins.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Magna Acies! Armies & Battles: Punic and Macedonian Wars
Magna Acies! Eserciti & Battaglie: Guerre Puniche e Macedoniche
boardgame.description:
This booklet is the first in a series, entitled Armies and Battles, accompanying MAGNA ACIES! "battle size" rules for 3D wargames for the Ancient age (without the rules, therefore, this booklet serves you little purpose).

We decided to start from the Punic Wars and the Macedonian Wars because these were probably, from a tactical point of view, the most interesting conflicts of Antiquity, which marked (together with Alexander's campaigns) new reference models for Military Art.

During these conflicts, the Romans had to abandon the primitive concept of the simple "attack on the center" to worry about the wings as well, while the phalanx ceased to be the most successful formation of Antiquity: fundamental themes, as you can well understand, decisive for 15 subsequent centuries and even beyond.

This booklet consists essentially of three elements:

three "Quickstart Scenarios" (with attached game tables),
fifteen "Army Lists" (always with attached game tables) and
six "Battle Maps"


—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Magna Acies! Fast "battle size" rules for 3D wargame in the Ancient age

boardgame.name: MODELS
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

“Models are the only other kind of person, other than diplomats, who don’t have to worry about getting access to foreign nations.”

– Agent 080


This is a game about international super models who have also been enlisted to become M.O.D.E.L.S. – Military Operations, Defense, and Emergency Liaison Specialists – in the service of The Agency, a worldwide secret organization. Set in a fictional version of our own modern world, players portray these M.O.D.E.L.S. who use their specialized skills, universal passports, and fashionable super science technology to protect the world from itself. Handling missions all around the globe, the M.O.D.E.L.S. will engage in various espionage missions that combine the thrilling tradecraft drama of spy stories with irreverent humor and stylish over-the-top action.

While you are more than welcome to play this game with your own rules or setting in mind, the System section contains more information on the game mechanics. The Character section contains information on the Specialty Sheets. The Dossier section has the information meant for players to work with. And the Conspiracy section contains information, tools, tips, and even optional rules for the GM. Finally, the Mixed Signals has a lot of sources and suggestions that can be used to make your games more interesting.

boardgame.name: La Pietra Gemella
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Avventura per AD&D molto ben curata e completa, ambientata tra il Primo Piano Materiale e Planescape, con due espansioni: Erenduyn e Aulmadorn.

boardgame.name: Battle Chaos
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

La prima avventura del Ciclo di RavAge, da utilizzare assieme al volume dei personaggi da torneo che troverete disponibile assieme al modulo.

User summary:

The tournament scenario is published as two PDF files:

44-page scenario
14-page pre-generated characters

boardgame.name: Obscura Draco
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Obscura Draco ricrea l’ambiente ideale dove far sviluppare le azioni di quattro draghi in qualità di personaggi giocanti. I giocatori saranno così catapultati all’interno di un pericoloso gioco di potere, fatto di solide alleanze e subdoli inganni.

boardgame.name: Dragonfire
boardgame.description:
Guida di Riferimento per il DM

From the back of the book:

Questo breve manualetto introduce il Dungeon Master a un breve compendio di regole che disciplinano il Nyuarad: la capacità di manipolazione del soffio draconico, a opera degli stessi draghi.

Un sistema Light Rules con il quale DM potrà rendere i propri draghi ancor più accattivanti e pericolosi (tanto i Draghi PG quanto quelli del Manuale dei Mostri).

Dragonfire può essere giocato in maniera indipendente dal modulo Obscura Draco.

boardgame.name: Dragon Compendium
boardgame.description:
Compendio per i PG

From the back of the book:

Questo breve manualetto introduce il Dungeon Master a un breve compendio di regole che disciplinano il Nyuarad: la capacità di manipolazione del soffio draconico, a opera degli stessi draghi.
Un sistema Light Rules con il quale DM potrà rendere i propri draghi ancor più accattivanti e pericolosi (tanto i Draghi PG quanto quelli del Manuale dei Mostri).

Dragon Compendium può essere giocato in maniera indipendente dal modulo Obscura Draco.

boardgame.name: Horns of the North
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Una raccolta di oggetti magici basati sui corni vichinghi, che permette di introdurre una nuovo modo di creare una campagna piena di sfide.

boardgame.name: Ombre su Rabeforst
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Anime inquiete e oscuri segreti attendono gli avventurieri nella "Foresta del Corvo", dove una antica maledizione sembra gravare sulla casata dei Wassenholf.

boardgame.name: Wintersun - Il Risveglio del Caos
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Modulo scenario “universale”, studiato principalmente per le diverse edizioni di Dungeons & Dragons®, ma anche integrabile con altri sistemi di giocoChe aspettate a prender parte alla battaglia più crudele di tutti i tempi, contrastando la minaccia dei Giganti del Fuoco e dei loro alleati?

boardgame.name: Runechase - Saga dei Regni del Nord
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Modulo scenario “universale”, studiato principalmente per le diverse edizioni di Dungeons & Dragons®, ma anche integrabile con altri sistemi di giocoChe aspettate a prender parte alla battaglia più crudele di tutti i tempi, contrastando la minaccia dei Giganti del Fuoco e dei loro alleati?

boardgame.name: Zombicide (2nd Edition): Nico
boardgame.description:
Nico is a promotional character (miniature plus character card) for Zombicide 2nd Edition.

A master of wielding dual katanas.

listing.notes:
NICO - KICKSTARTER PROMO - ENGLISH
NEW IN SHRINK - never opened!
INCLUDES: - Miniature - Survivor card - Character sheet (Zombicide: Chronicles – The Roleplaying Game)
Feel free to PM me with any questions or if you are interested and would like to receive further pictures!
Payment via Bank Transfer or PayPal. If you cannot or do not wish to pay with the option "Sending to a friend or family", than please pay an additional 4%.
Will ship same/next day after payment received (according to the time zone!)
Includes KS exclusive NICO set and NICO ID Sheet for Zombicide RPG and Chronicles Survivor set. See Photo. All new.
Brand new and still factory sealed. Box has light wear from storage.

boardgame.name: BattleTech: Alpha Strike – Succession Wars Cards
boardgame.description:
Alpha Strike is BattleTech’s fast-playing game of armored combat. Alpha Strike Succession Wars Cards contains the ‘Mech Units that survived centuries of warfare across the Inner Sphere. Fullcolor, poker sized, and laminated for dry-erase use, you just need miniatures and dice and you’ll be battling for control of mankind’s tenuous future.

98 double-sided, dry-erase cards expand players’ available ‘Mech roster.
10 double-sided combat command cards include special rules to play units of renown from BattleTech lore.
Includes all the ‘Mechs from Technical Readout: Succession Wars

boardgame.name: Making the Rounds: A Micro Nursing Game
boardgame.description:
You have 2 shifts to try and treat all of your patients in your hall by monitoring, evaluating, medicating, taking samples to the lab, and even treating Code: Blues. Each patient will have 3 needs you will have to meet with your action cards. Drawing action cards will let you decide where you should start and placing your nurse meeple there and trying to pull the right combo to complete the task at hand. If you succeed, you can flip the patient card over, if you don’t succeed, you turn the card sideways and on your next shift you can try to treat that patient again. If after 2 shifts you only have 1 patient not succeeded then you will have 1 over time shift to treat that patient.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: BattleTech: Alpha Strike – Clan Invasion Cards
boardgame.description:
Alpha Strike is BattleTech’s fast-playing game of armored combat. Alpha Strike Clan Invasion Cards contains the ‘Mech Units that sprung from the distant Periphery to terrorize the Inner Sphere and ‘Mechs designed to repel them. Full-color, poker sized, and laminated for dry-erase use, you just need miniatures and dice and you’ll be battling for control of mankind’s tenuous future.

98 double-sided, dry-erase cards expand players’ available ‘Mech roster.
10 double-sided combat command cards include special rules to play units of renown from BattleTech lore.
Includes all the ‘Mechs from Technical Readout: Clan Invasion

boardgame.name: Eris and Umbra
boardgame.description:
The worlds of Eris and Umbra are at constant war...

Build your own narrative and play with friends over drinks or food!

Designed to be friendly to new players.

See Eris and Umbra : Subterfuge for example pre-made characters and scenarios.

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: Mage War
boardgame.description:
Mage War is a FREE trading card game where you construct your own cards and make decks to battle other players. It is a game of strategy with a focus on balanced mechanics that put opponents on equal footing. (No need to worry about an opponent having an advantage over you because they spent more money to build their deck.) The rules lay out all the guidelines for designing and creating your own cards and decks as well as how to play. The limits of your power are the limits of your own imagination! Craft your own cards and build your own strategy around your own play style and pit your ideas against your friends.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Szybkie bańki
boardgame.description: The game objective is to find the right card faster than your opponents. The player who has the most cards at the end will win.

boardgame.name: Hot Wheels. Вызов принят!
boardgame.description: Children's racing game where players upgrade their cars and try to win trophies during the 3-laps' drive. The one who gets the most points in the end wins.

boardgame.name: А у моего бати руки-бензопилы
boardgame.description:
A comic-strategic game in which the participants "measure up" the coolness of their dad. They are credited with the properties of heroes in games, comics and films. Collect combinations and monitor the progress of opponents. The game combines simple and strategic gameplay with a fun design full of references to popular games and films from the 90s and 2000s.

Players use Honor cards to "pimp" their dad, dressing him in armor and presenting him with various kinds of artifacts that refer to popular games, films and comics. And opponents' dads can be thrown with negative discouraging cards. Reaction cards allow you to fend off opponents or strengthen your actions, and Freak cards are the most powerful arguments in the fight against other players. For each set they collect, players receive Honorable Points and new powerful cards.

On his turn, a player can play from 1 to 2 cards. Before playing an Honor card, the player must say loudly and clearly: "And my / your daddy ..." - and then the text from the card. Otherwise, the card will not work and will be discarded.

English version of title: And my daddy has chainsaw hands....

Play continues until "The End" card is reached and points are totaled. The player with the most points wins.

boardgame.name: Firunsbaer (Issue 5 - 1995)
boardgame.description: Published in summer 1995, Firunsbaer 1995 contains various articles and resources for DSA, a short history of the zine itself, and other fandom materials.

boardgame.name: Abyss: Folded Space Insert
boardgame.description:
This insert is compatible with Abyss plus the Leviathan and Kraken expansions.

The design provides both efficient storage and improved game play. Many of the trays can be utilised during the game, and they greatly aid set-up and clear-away times. The rules and boards act as a lid on top of the trays.

The trays are arranged in up to three layers.
The location tiles are placed in a single stack at the top of the box, held in place by two filler trays.

All component types are split by type organising all the game components. Each of the card trays have space for sleeved cards.

The design includes two filler trays which hold in place the location tiles and the plastic cups. These two trays also store the two miniatures from the expansions.

As mentioned above many of the trays can be used during the game to organise the components and make access by all players easy.

When packing the box, first place the score pad on top of the plastic cups as shown. Next place the main game board on top of the trays, together with the three smaller board pieces. Lastly place on top the rule book from the base game and then the two expansion rule books. This fully fills the box and allows for vertical storage of the game.

Note: Insert designed for game with external box dimensions of 28.6 x 28.6 x 8.0 cm.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: It's Alive!: Monster-Making Mayhem
boardgame.description:
Be the first to assemble a monster from different body parts and bring it to life!

A monster must have the following body parts: A head, a torso, a left arm, a right arm, a left leg and a right leg.

Use power cards to improve your chances or to hinder your opponents! This is where the game really comes to life. From creating monsters with different background colours to stealing cards from your opponents or destroying their power cards, you'll find many fiendish ways to give yourself an advantage - but beware, your opponents will be trying to play the same tricks on you!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: She Who is a Fortress in Dark Water
boardgame.description:
From the designers blog:

This adventure has:

A boy with a key for a spine
A magic thread
A giant crocodile named "Cynthia."
Small creatures born from intestinal distress
and so much more!

boardgame.name: The Archon Files: Grrl Power
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

MEET THE HEROES OF ARCHON.

In 2010 David Barrack launched the Grrl Power webcomic, which he straightforwardly described as:

“A comic about a crazy nerdette that becomes a superheroine. Humor, action, cheesecake, beefcake, ‘splosions, and maybe some drama. Possibly ninjas. Rated PG-13 for violence and gratuitous cheesecake (and beefcake) Rated R for language. Seriously, Sydney has a filthy mouth.”

In 2017, Marion G. Harmon, author of Wearing the Cape series and writer of the Wearing the Cape RPG thought it would be awesome to include a gallery of Grrl Power heroes as a Kickstarter campaign add-on. Because, reasons.

Mr. Barrack enthusiastically agreed, and the two of them... took their sweet time pushing it to completion.

But here it is! A gallery of Archon heroes written up for play with Fate Condensed (or Fate Core, and also possibly Super-Powered Fate). It includes:

A field report of the world of Archon (written by an exasperated observer).
An overview of suggested dial-settings and rules for a Fate-based campaign in the Archon Reality.
Character files for: Maxima, Super Hiro, Mr. Amorphous, Achilles, Anvil, Harem, Heatwave, Stalwart, Halo, Jiggawat, Varia, Dabbler, Math, and supporting cast Peggy and Dr. Zoeng.
Dozens of new power descriptions and stunts useable in any Fate-based superhero RPG.
Original character art by David Barrack.

boardgame.name: Storm Warning
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is a Cepheus Engine Adventure

Strange communication signals have been detected coming from the deep desert on an Olonsean prison planet. The Olonsean Empire wants answers. Did a prisoner escape? Or has some alien race come back to claim this planet?

boardgame.name: Operation Vanguard
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

It is August 1940 and the Netherlands is still reeling from the German Invasion just three months earlier. Queen Wilhelmina and her administration have fled into exile and an uneasy peace settles over the country, as the first embers of resistance begin to smoulder.

From the small Dutch fishing town of Nermegen, reports reach Britain’s Section M of a strange installation being constructed on the nearby Skellen Island. They also confirm the presence of Nachtwölfe, the Night Wolves, a Nazi occult organisation devoted to weird science and eldritch technology, who are said to rival Black Sun itself.

Seizing the opportunity, Section M dispatches a covert team by submarine to learn more about Nachtwölfe’s plans. Once in situ, the agents must contact the fledgling local resistance and gather detailed intelligence. Why are Nachtwölfe here? What happened at the forbidden site near the Arn river? What are these Night Wolves doing at St Olaf’s lighthouse?

The agents must piece together several component parts of this mystery, before finding a way to approach the heavily guarded Skellen Island itself. There, they’ll encounter advanced technology, strange, modified creatures, and face a deranged Nachtwölfe commander, intent on completing a bizarre bio-experiment, before confronting the horrifying truth which lies at the heart of Installation 41 itself.

Overshadowing all, is the malice of an ancient undersea race, who, provoked beyond measure by the unwise machinations of man are now ready to strike—a fearsome foe to contend with in Operation Vanguard, a brand new PDF only mission for the Achtung! Cthulhu 2d20 RPG!

Operation Vanguard is a direct sequel to A Quick Trip to France, the FREE Achtung! Cthulhu 2d20 Quickstart for GM’s looking to run a continuing narrative campaign.
Features a 29-page full colour PDF, with a daring mission for four to five audacious agents set deep behind enemy lines with full enemy profiles, NPCs, maps, and handouts.
Action, investigation and mayhem abound, as players first cross swords with Nachtwölfe and become embroiled with the Deep Ones, a major Mythos power.

boardgame.name: Six Spells: Mythos
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

“Mythos” is a word that evokes a certain ilk of horror that emphasize humanity’s utter isolation and inconsequence in a monstrous, unforgiving universe, in which things do go bump in the night and humans are the food or playthings of terrible entities.

Most of those initial stories came directly from author H.P. Lovecraft, but other writers of his era used the Mythos with his permission and put their own stamp on this subgenre of early 20th century horror. Accordingly, the spells that appear here were inspired not just by the tales Lovecraft, but also by the work of Clark Ashton Smith. They touch on the wrongness of reality, on the ability of cultists to bend and warp it, and on humanity’s blindness to these things.

This mini-publication contains six Mythos spells — Awaken Idol, Create Unholy Food and Water, Darklight Prism, Pass Flame, Reverse Staircase, and Summon Demonic Mason — compatible with any games using the OGL/d20 system.

boardgame.name: Rat Queens: To the Slaughter
boardgame.description:
Forge friendships and find your family as you take on the role of the rat queens in Rat Queens: To the Slaughter. Choose from four rat queens, each with asymmetric and unique playstyles, in order to save Palisade from total destruction. Power up your queen with new abilities and friendship as you take on hordes of monsters. Each queen comes packed with upgradeable abilities you have to spend gold to learn, allowing you to customize your queen differently each game to fit what the party needs!

Players spend the first half of the game defeating monsters to earn rewards to upgrade their ability deck and stats in order to prepare for the Big Bad hiding in the wake. The more monsters you defeat, the more powerful you become and the more time you have before the Big Bad arrives, with that enemy being determined by which monsters escape. Combat is a simplified version of RPG-style combat with easy-to-learn dice checks for attacks and abilities.

From the first sip to the last drop. Sisters. Warriors. Queens. Friends to the very end.

—description from the publisher

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: The Nameless Grimoire (1st Edition)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Nameless Grimoire is a supplement for The Nightmares Underneath (and other old school fantasy role-playing games) that covers spells and spellcasters.

This book includes:

666 spells and dozens of variations, arranged in 33 spell schools (with simple guidelines for specialist caster), as well as a single d1000 table.
6 new character types: Battle Wizard, Blood Caster, Chaos Mage, Shadowsneak, Sorcerer, and Spellslinger.
Options for supernatural heritage or sorcerous backgrounds that give your characters mechanical benefits and drawbacks.
A new random equipment table for wizards and spellcasting characters.
Random spell name tables and random wizard name tables.
4 other character types: Avatar, Druid, Mystic, and Witch.
Rules for divine patrons and six example patrons.
Rules for crafting your own magical items, made from magical ingredients.
A short bestiary of monsters mentioned in the spells.


The Nameless Grimoire is intended primarily for use with The Nightmares underneath, but you can use it with other old school games if you like. Only the first edition reprints the spellcasting rules, however, and they are not the same as those in the second edition.

boardgame.name: Poop Poop
boardgame.description:
Poop Poop is a collection set card game for children.

The children are farmers that have to preparing to fertilize their fields. They need the help of farm animals. Each animals have to eat and drink to poop. Collecting all poop is needed to win.

Each player have five cards, when the player has at same time an animal, a water and food can discard them and take the corresponding poop.

There are also some special cards to stole poop, or change poop with other players.

—user summary

boardgame.name: USS Laffey: The Ship That Would Not Die
boardgame.description:
"USS Laffey: The Ship That Would Not Die" is a solo wargame of damage control as you desperately scramble to survive the most determined Japanese Kamikaze attacks of World War II. You will re-enact the harrowing 80 minutes of terror and mayhem the crew of the Laffey went through as they fought off 22 Japanese planes.

You will move your damage control teams to stem the current crisis, and then roll and allocate dice in an attempt to aid the ship or damage the attacking planes. You could attempt to ask help from the nearby carrier Shamrock Bay, but doing so will take time and effort away from the current attacks.

If you can survive the last Japanese attack with the ship still afloat you win!

—description from the designer

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Played 3 x times
unopened as new

boardgame.name: Partners
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

One's a real straight shooter. The other's a total wild card. Together, chasing down a mystery, they are... Partners.

Partners is a unique story-telling game where the plot is procedurally generated. Using random words and a regular playing card deck, two players will build their very own detective show, four suspects and a solution to the mystery even they won't see coming.

Although designed specifically for two players, the game can be played with one or many. You just need a deck of cards and a desire to butt heads and solve crimes.

boardgame.name: Watergate: GeekUp Bit Set
boardgame.description:
The pieces are made of a hard plastic, similar to Bakelite, and the graphics are applied via a 4-color heat transfer process, which fuses the images to the plastic in a way that makes them very scratch resistant, meaning they should last a lifetime.

This GeekUp set includes:

36 Evidence tokens
one custom, microfiber drawbag, with artwork from the game printed on each side
7 Picture tiles
10 Pushpins (to replace the wooden markers for the Momentum and Initiative Tokens)

boardgame.name: Ra: GeekUp Bit Set
boardgame.description:
The pieces are made of a hard plastic, similar to Bakelite, and the graphics are applied via a 4-color heat transfer process, which fuses the images to the plastic in a way that makes them very scratch resistant, meaning they should last a lifetime.

This GeekUp set includes:

180 tiles (sized 32mm x 32mm)
50 VP tokens (in denominations of 1, 2, 5, and 10)
A custom drawbag featuring artwork from the game

boardgame.name: Tapestry: GeekUp Bit Set
boardgame.description:
The pieces are made of a hard plastic, similar to Bakelite, and the graphics are engraved images (like the sides of custom dice), meaning they should last a lifetime.

This GeekUp set includes:

20 custom achievement track tokens (4 for each of the 5 player colors), engraved with the track's symbol for Military, Exploration, Science, and Technology, and sized to fit perfectly on the track
5 custom molded VP token, one in each of the 5 player colors

boardgame.name: It's a Wonderful World: GeekUp Bit Set
boardgame.description:
The pieces are made of a hard plastic, similar to Bakelite, and the graphics are applied via a 4-color heat transfer process, which fuses the images to the plastic in a way that makes them very scratch resistant, meaning they should last a lifetime.

This GeekUp set includes all 80 characters tokens (24mm diameter) with the original artwork from the game and are made from transparent plastic:

40 generals
40 financiers

boardgame.name: Yellow & Yangtze: GeekUp Bit Set
boardgame.description:
This unique set is new territory for BGG's GeekUp line, as each piece is a combination of 3mm of plastic on the top fused to 4mm of bamboo on the bottom. Similar to high quality Mahjong set, these double-layer tiles are substantially weighty and tall, and are sure to add thematic presence to your game.

This GeekUp set includes all 138 tiles (32mm wide hexagons) with the original artwork from the game and comes in its own cardboard "pizza" box (which fits inside the game box):

42 black tiles
36 red tiles
24 green
24 blue
12 yellow

boardgame.name: Dice Throne: Season One – GeekUp Bit Set
boardgame.description:
The pieces are made of a hard plastic, similar to Bakelite, and the graphics are applied via a 4-color heat transfer process, which fuses the images to the plastic in a way that makes them very scratch resistant, meaning they should last a lifetime.

This set includes upgraded versions of 86 of the status tokens, all 20mm circles (3mm deep), for the eight heroes:

Barbarian (1x Stun, 2x Concussion)
Moon Elf (2x Entangle, 5x Evasive, 2x Blind, 3x Targeted)
Pyromancer (4x Burn, 2x Knockdown, 9x Fire Mastery, 1x Stun)
Monk (11x Chi, 4x Cleanse, 2x Knockdown, 5x Evasive)
Paladin (1x Blessing of Divinity, 2x Crit, 2x Retribution, 2x Protect, 2x Accuracy)
Shadow Thief (6x Poison, 2x Shadows, 2x Sneak Attack)
Trent (2x Barbed Vine, 2x Wellspring)
Ninja (5x Ninjutsu, 3x Delayed Poison, 2x Smoke Bomb)


Note --> This set does NOT include the Trent's Spirit tokens - they are too large to convert into a GeekUp bit.

boardgame.name: Rogue Mansion
boardgame.description:
ABOUT
Rogue Mansion is a survival horror game mixed with rogue-like mechanics. Fight all kinds of creatures, solve enigmatic puzzles and look for anything that could be useful to escape alive from the ever-changing interiors of a mysterious mansion.

KEY FEATURES
Experience the game in different ways by choosing among multiple characters with their own equipment and unique perks. Note: There's only one character available in the sneak peek version of the game.

Explore a procedurally generated mansion that is different every time you play, and also becomes more dangerous and unpredictable based on your level of fear.
Manage your resources, solve puzzles, fight all forms of creatures and find a way out while you unravel the mysteries of the mansion.
Immerse yourself in a creepy atmosphere created by the combination of a stylish retro aesthetic with an added modern touch.

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: アザトース (Azathoth)
boardgame.description:
アザトース (Azathoth) is a card game from Japan mixing anime and Cthulhu themes. A variation on Old Maid, players are trying to form up pairs of cards to empty their hands. Some of the cards are for the Old Gods. The cards have text on them, and the Old Gods have special abilities. Players must always keep Old Gods cards in their hand (they start with one), and if they are found without one, they draw a penalty.

The main cards are anime, with letters of the alphabet, such that a player asks another for an A or a B and so on. Making up sets lets the player discard them.

The special abilities of the Old Gods restrict how those cards might be played.

Like many Loserdogs games, the game is sold in a large ziplocked bag with minimal production. The cardstock is thin but playable.
user summary

boardgame.name: Hero Realms: Imperial Justice Promo Card
boardgame.description:
Part of the Game Trade Magazine (GTM) May 2021 issue 255 but only for copies sold in stores in the USA. It will also later be available to buy from different sources, like conventions.

Name: Imperial Justice
Faction: Imperial
Gold Cost: 4
Card Type: Action
Card Text: Add 6 to your combat pool, Imperial Ally Ability: Draw a card for each opposing champion you stunned this turn.

listing.notes:
Only available through Game Trade Magazine (GTM) May 2021 issue 250 but only within copies sold in the USA. It will may ater be available at some conventions.

boardgame.name: Snakesss
boardgame.description:
The group has a multiple-choice question and only two minutes to work it out. The snakes amongst you already know the right answer — and they'll stop at nothing to keep you away from it.

In Snakesss, you deal out the cards and try to answer a multiple-choice question with the rest of the players. The more people who get it right, the more points you cash in — unless, of course, you get one of the snake cards. All the snakes already know the answer, so their job is a bit simpler. To score points, they have to sabotage the discussion and mislead the other players.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Mean Girls: The Party Game
boardgame.description:
Get ready for a party game that's fresher than peppermint foot cream and filled with more secrets than Gretchen Weiner's hair.

Gather your friends, tear a page of the Burn Book out of Mean Girls: The Party Game, and pass it around as you take turns answering scandalous questions about each other. Oh, and the best part? It's all totally anonymous.

Well, most of the time it is anyway. At the end of the round, each player gets to pick an answer that they'd like to reveal. If you wrote it, you have to come clean in front of everyone — so maybe don't write anything that's too mean.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Nice Buns
boardgame.description:
Nice Buns is a light strategy game in which players sit together in the "Nice Buns Buffet" and race to fill up their plate with three sets of colorful bao buns. Each round, you roll three dice that let you collect, steal, and trade different buns.

However, there's a twist! Before you do anything, the player on your left will get to decide which dice you can use...and which ones they'll keep for themselves.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Three Wise Words
boardgame.description:
In this simple party game, your partner has to guess the Secret Word that is nesting in your head.

To help them, you write down three different words as clues. But watch out! If the other teams guess any of your Clue Words, they’ll swoop down and steal your points, so don’t make them too obvious. But don’t make them too obscure either, or your bird-brained partner will never guess the Secret Word.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Castle Panic: Deluxe Collection
Castle Panic: Deluxe Edition – The Dark Titan and Engines of War
boardgame.description:
The Castle Panic Deluxe Collection is the long-awaited, ultimate, deluxe edition of Castle Panic and all of it's expansions. This giant box contains 5 games in their limited edition, deluxe versions including: Castle Panic, The Wizard's Tower, The Dark Titan, Engines of War, and the brand new expansion Crowns and Quests.

Each game retains the same mechanics fans have loved for over a decade, but now feature deluxe upgraded components. Each game comes with all new art, plastic Walls, Towers, and castle pieces, plastic Monster minis that feature a unique spinning base to track damage, wooden Monster tokens, promo cards, a deluxe monster bag, playmat, and much more. This massive collection features 180 plastic pieces including 97 Monster miniatures!

Castle Panic is a cooperative game for 1 to 6 players where everyone is working together to defend the castle from monsters coming in from the forest. The players must make it through all 49 Monster tokens and have at least 1 tower still standing in order to win the game. If the monsters destroy all 6 towers, the game ends and the monsters win.

In The Wizard's Tower, a friendly wizard joins your forces, giving the players access to powerful magic spell cards. But the monster army returns, bigger, smarter, and faster than ever before.

In The Dark Titan, the ancient Titan, Agranok returns to lay siege to the castle. Agranok is proceeded by his Heralds and brings new monsters while the players get help from Support Tokens and the Cavalier.

Engines of War brings a whole new economy to the game where players can assign tasks to the Engineer and collectively pay Resource cards toward those tasks to build traps and weapons. Meanwhile the monsters press the attack with Siege Engines and new creatures.

The newest expansion, Crowns and Quests, introduces playable characters with unique powers. The players must attempt to complete challenging quests such as retrieving magical items, destroying cursed temples, and even teleporting the entire castle to safety all while fighting off the monster army.

This collection is the centerpiece to the Castle Panic Deluxe Collection Kickstarter and as such will not be available through retail distribution.

-description from publisher

boardgame.name: Warhammer Underworlds: Caja de inicio para dos jugadores
Warhammer Underworlds: Set d'initiation pour deux joueurs
Warhammer Underworlds: Set introduttivo per due giocatori
Warhammer Underworlds: Starterset für zwei Spieler
Warhammer Underworlds: Two-Player Starter Set
Warhammer Underworlds: Стартовый набор для двух игроков
Warhammer Underworlds: 双人新手套装
boardgame.description:
This new two-player starter set for Warhammer Underworlds is designed to be a compact introduction to the game for new players. It focuses on the core gameplay of Warhammer Underworlds: Shadespire, without the spellcasting introduced in Nightvault, the hunter/quarry mechanics of Beastgrave, or the hunger and primacy of Direchasm. The 36-page rulebook has been written to be fast and easily comprehended, while incorporating some of the terminology employed in later 'seasons' of Warhammer Underworlds to ensure consistency with the latest editions of the game.

This set serves as a streamlined core set for players and includes two double-sided game boards that feature maps previously released for Shadespire. 90 tokens required to play are included as are 8 black and white combat dice.

Two warbands new to the system are included and can be used in other games of Warhammer Underworlds. Drepur's Wraithcreepers are represented by four glaivewraith miniatures and their associated fighter cards while Storm of Celestus offers three Stormcast Castigators and their gryph-hound to oppose the nighthaunts. Miniatures are designed as easy-to-build push-fit models. Each warband comes with a pre-made deck of 32 upgrade, ploy, and objective cards exclusive to their faction. These cards have a stylistic re-design from previous Warhammer Underworlds releases but retain identical card backs and functionality. There are no universal cards in this starter set.

Contents:
1 Learn to Play Rulebook
4 Push-fit Storm of Celestus Minis
4 Push-fit Drepur's Wraithcreeprs Minis
2 Double-sided Game Boards
5 Attack Dice
3 Defense
Fighter Cards
Warband-specific Cards
Tokens

boardgame.name: O Petróleo é nosso!
boardgame.description: In the early 1950s, Brazil was agitated by a campaign in favor of the nationalization of the oil industry. This game is based on this spirit: it is a simple game, the players spin the roulette wheel to transport their equipment to the drilling point. When they get there they automatically lose a round and start their progression through the houses corresponding to the land to be drilled. The winner is the first to reach the oil layer with an exact bid.

boardgame.name: The 実名報道 (The Jitsumeihodo)
boardgame.description:
The 実名報道 (The Jitsumeihodo) is a game from Japan in which players identify famous people by their real names. In japan, Jitsumeihodo means 'real name reporting' and is the somewhat controversial practise of identify people in news coverage by their real names.

The game has a deck of 60 cards, 30 being the real names of people, and 30 showing a colour photo of the person. On the back of the photos is the same photo min B&W and a short text explaining what crime they were arrested for. For example, a popular comedian caught with cocaine, or a hit-and-run driver.

The 30 photo cards are shuffled and laid out randomly on the table, showing only the colour photo side. The deck of names is shuffled up and placed in the middle, so the first name can be read out.

Players try to match up the correct name to the face. However, this is difficult since the people are generally known by a public name, not by their real name.

The game can be played solitaire.

Like many Loserdogs games, the game is sold in a large ziplocked bag with minimal production. The cardstock is thin but playable.
